name: No Future Reading List
description:
Reimagining future; a few books to begin with:

- "Fully Automated Luxury Communism: A Manifesto" - Aaron Bastani
- "Inventing the Future: Postcapitalism and a World Without Work" - Nick Srnicek and Alex Williams
- "Automation and the Future of Work" - Aaron Benanav
- "A World Without Police" - Geo Maher
- "Rebel Cities: From the Right to the City to the Urban Revolution" - David Harvey
- "Becoming Abolitionists Police, Protests, and the Pursuit of Freedom" - Derecka Purnell
- "The Future Is Degrowth: A Guide to a World beyond Capitalism" - Matthias Schmelzer, Aaron Vansintjan, and Andrea Vetter
